question: 代用
partsOfSpeech: noun, transitive, verbal noun, の adjective
sourceMnemonic:
A <kanji>substitute</kanji> <kanji>task</kanji> is a <vocabulary>substitution</vocabulary>.

Note that this word has a slightly formal feel to it.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
